CustomField.description: --DEPRECATED-- This field is optional unless the loan requires HMDA, then it is required. It is manually populated. This field indicates whether the loan or application was for manufactured housing, a multifamily dwelling, or a one- to-four-family dwelling other than manufactured housing.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Report whether the loan or application was for manufactured housing, a multifamily dwelling, or a one- to-four-family dwelling other than manufactured housing.
CustomField.label: -D Property Type

value.fullName: Code 1—One- to four-family dwelling (other than manufactured housing)
value.label: Code 1—One- to four-family dwelling (other than manufactured housing)
